text: Good morning everybody. Please make your own best judgement for work today. If you need to deal with kids or have too many hazards between home and work, by all means WFH today. Let us know on <#C0260V1C3|general> what you will be doing. With traffic being what it is, delayed start may make a lot of sense even if you're up for the challenge.
Also: the building is installing new door security. The keypads appear to not be working, though the doors are open if you just use them.
